mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ESTIMATE E, ESTIMATE_DETAIL ED WHERE ( CASE #{dateSearchCondition} WHEN 'estimateDate' THEN TO_DATE(ESTIMATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'effectiveDate' THEN TO_DATE(EFFECTIVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND e.estimate_no = ed.estimate_no(+)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ESTIMATE WHERE ESTIMATE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{estimateDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESTIMATE ( ESTIMATE_NO, CUSTOMER_CODE, ESTIMATE_DATE, CONTRACT_STATUS, ESTIMATE_REQUESTER, EFFECTIVE_DATE, PERSON_CODE_IN_CHARGE, DESCRIPTION ) values ( #{estimateNo} , #{customerCode} , #{estimateDate} , #{contractStatus} , #{estimateRequester} , #{effectiveDate} , #{personCodeInCharge} , #{description} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ESTIMATE SET CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode} , ESTIMATE_DATE = #{estimateDate} , CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus} , ESTIMATE_REQUESTER = #{estimateRequester} , EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{effectiveDate} , PERSON_CODE_IN_CHARGE = #{personCodeInCharge} , DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE ESTIMATE_NO = #{estimateNo}
UPDATE ESTIMATE SET CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus} WHERE ESTIMATE_NO = #{estimateNo}
